EODiSP gui API

Packages
org.eodisp.ui.common.actions Provides classes that can be used to work with the interaction interface of an EODiSP GUI application.
org.eodisp.ui.common.base Provides a set of base lasses to facilitate the creation of an EODiSP GUI application.
org.eodisp.ui.common.binding Provides classes used to bind UI elements to their value models
org.eodisp.ui.common.components Provides a base implementation of some standard UI components.
org.eodisp.ui.common.resources Common resources for all EODiSP applications.
org.eodisp.ui.mm.application GUI application classes of the model manager application
org.eodisp.ui.mm.config Configuration classes of the model manager GUI application
org.eodisp.ui.mm.controllers Provides all controllers for the model manager application.
org.eodisp.ui.mm.models Provides all models used in the model manager GUI application.
org.eodisp.ui.mm.resources Provides classes and resources used for localizing the application.
org.eodisp.ui.mm.views Provides all views used in the model manager GUI application.
org.eodisp.ui.rm.application GUI application classes of the repository manager application.
org.eodisp.ui.rm.config Configuration classes of the repository manager GUI application.
org.eodisp.ui.rm.controllers Provides all controllers for the repository manager application.
org.eodisp.ui.rm.models Provides all models used in the model manager GUI application.
org.eodisp.ui.rm.resources Provides classes and resources used for localizing the application.
org.eodisp.ui.rm.views Provides all views used in the repository manager GUI application.
org.eodisp.ui.shared.models Provides all models used by shared (i.e. used by all EODiSP GUI applications) components.
org.eodisp.ui.shared.views Provides views that can be used by all EODiSP GUI applications.
org.eodisp.ui.sm.application GUI application classes of the simulation manager application.
org.eodisp.ui.sm.config Configuration classes of the simulation manager GUI application.
org.eodisp.ui.sm.controllers Provides all controllers for the simulation manager application.
org.eodisp.ui.sm.models Provides all models used in the simulation manager GUI application.
org.eodisp.ui.sm.resources Provides classes and resources used for localizing the application.
org.eodisp.ui.sm.views Provides all views used in the simulation manager GUI application.
